about_the_game:
In this 3D platformer, Brock the dwarven blacksmith tries to master the true way of the hammer. On his journey through the world tree, he discovers that with a hammer you can not just destroy or build, but also repair, cook, swim, make music, settle disputes and so much more.

Explore small and dense filled 3D worlds and strike everything you see with your arsenal of hammers

  • Traverse dangerous terrain via hammer: Jump higher with a rubber mallet, swim with your trusty Hammerhead shark or fly with your Hammer-headed bat.

  • Charge into combat with a war hammer, ban-hammer or a nail-gun. Learn to throw your throwing hammer like an Olympic player.

  • Interact with your surroundings by using even more specialized hammers: make music with a piano hammer or drum mallets. Forge items with a blacksmith hammer and be the master of nails and build stuff with a claw hammer.

  • Be social with the residents of the world: Settle disputes with a judge's gavel, heal them with a doctor's reflex hammer and be funny with an inflatable hammer.

Brock´s hammerhard skill tree

The tree of life Mimameid, better known as Yggdrasil, serves as a playable skill tree, with each skill to be learned having its own level and hammer that focuses on it. You decide your journey, not only by choosing the next level, also by choosing your playstyle. 

Brock´s Story

The story is based on the Norse myth of the creation of Mjölnir, Thor's mighty hammer.

The trickster god Loki sends you on a journey to find and create a gift worthy of the gods. With a mischievous glint in his eye, Loki has wagered with fellow dwarves on your inability to complete the task, secretly manipulating events to increase the odds against you.

Strike it with your hammer while the iron is hot! Wishlist now!
